## KeepStateOptions type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type KeepStateOptions = Partial<{
    keepDirtyValues: boolean;
    keepErrors: boolean;
    keepDirty: boolean;
    keepValues: boolean;
    keepDefaultValues: boolean;
    keepIsSubmitted: boolean;
    keepTouched: boolean;
    keepIsValid: boolean;
    keepSubmitCount: boolean;
}>;
```
